page.title: 10Hoarstone
page.content: At Hoarstone there is a farm of 179 acres which is about 300 years old.Extensions were made in 1800.Two people own the land and they each farm the area which belongs to them.One of them has 139 acres and the other has 40 acres.Both grow barley and grass.The amount of fertilizer for the grassland is 3 hundredweight per acre per year.The barley is sprayed with a chemical formula. There are about 290 sheep and 3 horses.One of the farmers has some grazing cattle. Even though two people farm the land only one family lives in the house.There are four people in the family.When they moved in in 1951 there were 10 acres of woodland but these were cleared in 1960.There is a pool of 3 acres quite a distance from the house.
